subject: Good day,
body:
Good day,
Following your silence to our previous email, we have chosen to contact you again. This concerns the conclusive findings of an investigation by The Financial Intelligence Unit, affirming you as a victim of fraud or attempted fraud, acknowledging the potential emotional distress and financial difficulties experienced due to these events. The communication details a substantial compensation award of $980,000 intended to assist in your recovery and restore financial stability. This compensation, provided in a lump sum within 14 business days via a MasterCard issued in your name, is an effort to mitigate the hardship caused by the distressing incident.
 Further details shall be provided to you as soon as you contact the head of Compensation on: 
UKFIA@proton.me
Yours sincerely,
Mrs Esther Hillary
Clients Relationship Officer
The Financial Intelligence Unit
London, SE11 5EN - United Kingdom

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Esther Hillary,

I hope this message finds you well. I must admit, your email has taken me by surprise. I wasn't aware of any fraud or attempted fraud that I've been a victim of. Could you please provide more details about this incident? 

Also, could you explain how the Financial Unit came to this conclusion? And what does the recovery process involve?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marcia

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Good day Marcia You have to forward to us your full names,address and contact phone numbers to get your compensation fund of $980,000 sent to you through ATM MASTERCARD. Yours sincerely, Mrs Esther Hillary Clients Relationship Officer The Financial Intelligence Unit London, SE11 5EN - United Kingdom

Sent with [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/) secure email.

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Esther Hillary,

I hope this message finds you well. It's a pleasure to hear from you and I'm intrigued by your proposal. However, could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come about and why is it being sent through an ATM?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marcia

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hi Marcia
But we previously sent to you the below email,as a wire transfer can be commence upon your request.
Mrs Esther

subject: Re: Good day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Esther Hillary,

Thank you for reaching out to me and I appreciate your concern. It's quite surprising to hear about this situation as I wasn't aware of being a victim of fraud or attempted fraud. Could you please provide more details about the incident? What kind of fraud was it and how did it happen?

Also, could you explain more about the award that is intended to assist in my recovery? How does this process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Marcia
